'''Purpur stairs''' are a [[purpur]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Purpur stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Purpur Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Purpur stairs generate as part of [[End City|end cities]] and [[End City#End ship|end ship]]s.
